description: Technical field documentation for AI assistant / Text-to-SQL RAG system. Covers all major Odoo models used in the business flow: Purchase → Inventory → Sales → Accounts.

level_1_master_style.description: Master product style. Not a separate Odoo model. Multiple product.template records sharing the same x_studio_style_reference code are children of the same master style.

level_2_colorway.description: A colorway/color variant of a master style. This is the main product record. Each product.template with the same x_studio_style_reference belongs to the same master style.

level_3_sku.description: The actual SKU / size variant. Child of product.template. Also called: variant, SKU, size level. The attribute is always 'SKU' and values are sizes.

flow: User types in Odoo Chat Widget
Claude generates ORM domain filters or raw SQL

delivery_flow.summary: Every sale.order generates exactly 2 stock.picking records: PICK (Stock→Dispatch) then OUT (Dispatch→Customer).

business_context.key_model_relationships_text:
sale.order
    ├── sale.order.line          (order_line)
    │       ├── product.product  (product_id)
    │       ├── stock.move       (move_ids)
    │       └── purchase.order.line (purchase_line_ids)  [if MTO]
    │
    ├── stock.picking [PICK]     (picking_ids)
    │       ├── stock.move       (move_ids)
    │       └── stock.move.line  (move_line_ids)
    │
    └── stock.picking [OUT]      (picking_ids)
            ├── stock.move       (move_ids)
            └── stock.move.line  (move_line_ids)

purchase.order
    ├── purchase.order.line      (order_line)
    │       └── product.product  (product_id)
    └── stock.picking [RECEIPT]  (picking_ids)

product.template
    └── product.product          (product_variant_ids)

stock.quant  →  current on-hand per product / location / lot

purchase.order.label: Purchase Order
purchase.order.description: Represents a purchase order placed with a vendor. Tracks all purchasing activity from confirmation through receipt and billing.

name.label: Order Reference
name.description: PO order number — unique identifier of the PO used for search.

partner_id.label: Vendor
partner_id.description: The vendor this PO is placed with.

state.label: Status
state.description: Status of the PO. 'purchase' = confirmed, 'done' = locked (all done). Business usually progresses to 'purchase' state and stops after receipt validation. Not creating bills/payments currently.

dest_address_id.label: Dropship Address
dest_address_id.description: Default destination location — where stock goes after receiving.

date_approve.label: Confirmation Date
date_approve.description: Date when the PO was confirmed.

create_date.label: Created on
create_date.description: Date when the PO was created.

write_date.label: Last Updated on
write_date.description: Updated when stock picking receipt is finished.

order_line.label: Order Lines
order_line.description: Lines of the PO, each linked to a product.product (SKU).

currency_id.label: Currency
currency_id.description: Currency in which products are being purchased. Stored in currency table.

currency_rate.label: Currency Rate
currency_rate.description: Conversion rate for the purchase currency. Stored in currency rate table.

amount_untaxed.label: Untaxed Amount
amount_untaxed.description: Subtotal of the PO before tax.

amount_tax.label: Taxes
amount_tax.description: Tax amount — usually 5% VAT in Dubai.

invoice_count.label: Bill Count
invoice_count.description: Number of bills created based on partial receiving of products.

picking_ids.label: Receptions
picking_ids.description: Receipts created based on partial receiving of products.

total_product_qty.label: Demand
total_product_qty.description: Total demand of the entire PO — sum of all ordered quantities across all lines.

total_qty_received.label: Received
total_qty_received.description: Total quantity actually received across all receipts of the PO.

total_qty_invoiced.label: Billed
total_qty_invoiced.description: Total quantity invoiced across all bills of the PO.

receipt_status.label: Receipt Status
receipt_status.description: 'ready' = confirmed and about to receive. 'done' = received and validated.

is_shipped.label: Is Shipped
is_shipped.description: Whether all goods have been shipped/received.

user_id.label: Purchase Representative
user_id.description: Internal user responsible for this PO.

notes.label: Terms and Conditions
notes.description: Internal notes or T&C for this PO.

date_planned.label: Expected Arrival
date_planned.description: Expected arrival date of the goods.

purchase.order.line.label: Purchase Order Line
purchase.order.line.description: Each line of a Purchase Order representing one SKU (product.product) with its ordered quantity, price, and receipt/billing status.

name.label: Description
name.description: Purchase description that comes along with the product line.

product_id.label: Product
product_id.description: The SKU ordered. ID is displayed as [default_code] name — the internal reference code plus product name.

product_qty.label: Quantity
product_qty.description: Demand — how many units are ordered on this line.

product_uom.label: Unit of Measure
product_uom.description: Unit of measure for this line.

price_unit.label: Unit Price
price_unit.description: Cost price of this SKU — becomes standard_price in product.product after PO confirmation.

discount.label: Discount (%)
discount.description: Discount percentage applied on the unit price.

date_planned.label: Expected Arrival
date_planned.description: Expected arrival date for this line.

qty_received.label: Received Qty
qty_received.description: Quantity actually received for this line.

qty_to_invoice.label: To Invoice Quantity
qty_to_invoice.description: Billed quantity — same as received unless items are damaged.

order_id.label: Order Reference
order_id.description: The parent Purchase Order this line belongs to.

partner_id.label: Partner
partner_id.description: Vendor for this line (inherited from PO).

move_ids.label: Reservation
move_ids.description: Stock moves generated from this PO line.

sale_order_id.label: Sale Order
sale_order_id.description: Source Sale Order if this PO was generated from a SO.

sale_line_id.label: Origin Sale Item
sale_line_id.description: Source Sale Order Line if generated from a SO.

stock.picking.label: Stock Picking / Transfer
stock.picking.description: Universal model used for ALL stock operations in the system. The type of operation is determined by picking_type_id. Used for: Receipts (from Purchase), Deliveries (from Sales), Internal Transfers, Pick, Pack, POS movements. The origin field links back to the source document (PO, SO, etc.).

picking_types.Internal Transfers: Warehouse to warehouse or location to location

PICK.description: Internal transfer Stock→Dispatch. Reference format JCUSQ/PICK/xxxxx.

OUT.description: Outgoing transfer Dispatch→Customer. Reference format JCUSQ/OUT/xxxxx. Often waits for PICK completion.

name.label: Reference
name.description: Receipt/Transfer ID — unique identifier used to search for a specific picking (e.g. JCUSQ/IN/00102).

origin.label: Source Document
origin.description: The PO/SO/other document for which this picking was created. Links back to the source.

picking_type_id.label: Operation Type
picking_type_id.description: Defines the type of picking: Receipt, Delivery, Internal Transfer, etc. This is what differentiates all picking records.

partner_id.label: Contact
partner_id.description: Vendor or customer associated with this picking.

purchase_id.label: Purchase Order
purchase_id.description: The Purchase Order this receipt was created for.

location_dest_id.label: Destination Location
location_dest_id.description: Where stock is going after the operation.

move_ids.label: Stock Moves
move_ids.description: Link to stock.move — all stock in/out movements are tracked there. This is the relationship to the stock.move model.

move_line_ids.label: Operations
move_line_ids.description: Relationship at the order line item level (stock.move.line) — detailed scan/operation level.

backorder_id.label: Back Order of
backorder_id.description: When there is a partial delivery, backorders are created. This links the backorder to the original picking.

backorder_ids.label: Back Orders
backorder_ids.description: All backorders created from this picking.

return_id.label: Return of
return_id.description: If this is a return, links to the original picking.

is_return.label: Return
is_return.description: Flags this picking as a return operation.

is_locked.label: Is Locked
is_locked.description: Flag telling the warehouse team that someone else is already scanning/processing this picking.

date_done.label: Date of Transfer
date_done.description: When the receipt/transfer was validated and completed.

total_demand.label: Total Demand
total_demand.description: Total quantity demanded on this picking/receipt.

total_done.label: Total Done
total_done.description: Total quantity actually done/scanned and validated on this picking.

group_id.label: Procurement Group
group_id.description: Links related operations in the same procurement group.

is_return_picking.label: Is Return Picking
is_return_picking.description: True if this is a return transfer

is_ready_pick.label: Is Ready Pick
is_ready_pick.description: CUSTOM — Picker has marked items as ready to pick

is_ready_pack.label: Is Ready Pack
is_ready_pack.description: CUSTOM — Items are ready to be packed

abd_order.label: Abd Order
abd_order.description: CUSTOM — Order destined for Abu Dhabi

storepickuporder.label: Storepickuporder
storepickuporder.description: CUSTOM — Customer will pick up from store

order_group_label.label: Order Group Label
order_group_label.description: CUSTOM — Categorizes order by region/type (Dubai, Sharjah, Abu Dhabi, International, StorePickup)

gift_box.label: Gift Box
gift_box.description: CUSTOM — Customer requested gift box packaging

label_genrated.label: Label Genrated
label_genrated.description: CUSTOM — Shipping label has been generated

date_delivery.label: Date Delivery
date_delivery.description: CUSTOM — Expected delivery date to customer

weight_shipment.label: Weight Shipment
weight_shipment.description: CUSTOM — Weight sent to carrier for shipment

subtract_value.label: Subtract Value
subtract_value.description: CUSTOM — Value to subtract from shipment total

locked_by.label: Locked By
locked_by.description: CUSTOM — User who locked this picking to prevent edits

has_missing_products.label: Has Missing Products
has_missing_products.description: CUSTOM — One or more products are missing/out of stock

ict_internal_transfer_id.label: Ict Internal Transfer Id
ict_internal_transfer_id.description: CUSTOM — Links to the inter-warehouse transfer supplying this picking

product.template.label: Product Template (Colorway — Level 2)
product.template.description: Represents a colorway/color variant of a master style. This is the main product record in Odoo. Multiple product.template records sharing the same x_studio_style_reference belong to the same master style. Each product.template has child SKUs (product.product) which are the size variants.

default_code.label: Internal Reference
default_code.description: MOST IMPORTANT — unique product code used throughout the system. Main unique identity of the product at colorway level. All queries and data requests are based on this.

categ_id.label: Product Category
categ_id.description: Always set to 'All' — not used for business categorization.

active.label: Active
active.description: Whether the product is archived (false) or active (true).

x_avtive.label: Active (Selling Status)
x_avtive.description: true = currently selling / false = not yet published for sale on website.

detailed_type.label: Product Type
detailed_type.description: Always 'Storable' — only one type used in the business.

x_isNew.label: Is New
x_isNew.description: Tells the website if the product is new. Also used for sashes and other display purposes.

hero_product.label: Hero Product
hero_product.description: Flags the best-selling / most important products.

online_datetime.label: Online From
online_datetime.description: IMPORTANT — when the product went live online. Used for inventory aging analysis, slow-moving product analysis, and sales performance over time.

x_sale.label: Sale
x_sale.description: Whether the product is on sale or selling at regular price.

x_studio_style_reference.label: Studio Style Reference
x_studio_style_reference.description: MASTER STYLE CODE — links multiple colorways (product.template records) to the same master style (Level 1 → Level 2 link). All products with the same value here are siblings under one master style.

x_studio_color_reference.label: Studio Color Reference
x_studio_color_reference.description: Color position indicator — e.g. '2nd color of 4'. Used on website to indicate which color variant this is.

x_studio_many2one_field_mG9Pn.label: Brands
x_studio_many2one_field_mG9Pn.description: IMPORTANT — brand of the product. Links to x_brand table. Each product has one brand.

x_studio_many2many_field_Z7TLl.label: Color Tags
x_studio_many2many_field_Z7TLl.description: Color combination description — describes the color combination of this product (e.g. 'Green & Grey', 'Blue & White').

x_studio_many2many_field_IXz60.label: Product Tags (Season)
x_studio_many2many_field_IXz60.description: MOST IMPORTANT — season(s) the product belongs to. Links to x_product_tags table. A product can belong to many seasons. This is the primary way to filter products by season.

x_productTagStyle.label: Product Tag Style
x_productTagStyle.description: Ribbon/sash style to display on website.

x_productTagValue.label: Product Tag Value
x_productTagValue.description: Ribbon/sash value to display on website.

list_price.label: Sales Price (Template)
list_price.description: NOT USED — actual sale price lives at SKU level (lst_price in product.product).

standard_price.label: Cost (Template)
standard_price.description: NOT USED — actual cost price lives at SKU level (standard_price in product.product).

uom_id.label: Unit of Measure
uom_id.description: Unit of measure for the product.

attribute_line_ids.label: Product Attributes
attribute_line_ids.description: Attribute is always 'SKU' with size values — used to create variants (product.product children/SKUs).

product_variant_ids.label: Products (SKUs)
product_variant_ids.description: Relation between this colorway (parent) and its child SKUs (product.product).

product_variant_count.label: # Product Variants
product_variant_count.description: Number of child SKUs (sizes) under this colorway.

qty_available.label: Quantity On Hand
qty_available.description: Total SOH — all units in stock regardless of whether some are reserved or in active orders.

total_free_qty.label: Total Free QTY
total_free_qty.description: Sum of free_qty across all sizes (product.product children) — actual available to sell.

total_purchased.label: Purchased
total_purchased.description: Sum of all purchased quantities across all sizes of this product.

total_sold.label: Sold
total_sold.description: Sum of all sold quantities across all sizes of this product.

total_inprocess.label: Total In Process
total_inprocess.description: Sum of in-process qty across all sizes — sold online but not yet picked/packed/validated.

mayoral_total_soh.label: Mayoral Total SOH
mayoral_total_soh.description: Total SOH in Mayoral franchise stores. Included in qty_available — just an identifier to separate Mayoral stock.

mayoral_total_store_soh.label: Mayoral Store SOH
mayoral_total_store_soh.description: Mayoral franchise store stock quantity (not used often).

public_categ_ids.label: Website Product Category
public_categ_ids.description: ACTUAL product categories used in the business. USE THIS FIELD when filtering products by category — not categ_id.

x_sfcc_primary_category.label: Primary Category
x_sfcc_primary_category.description: One main primary category for the product.

available_in_pos.label: Available in POS
available_in_pos.description: Whether product is available to sell in physical store POS system.

x_studio_sfcc_sales_description.label: Sales Description (EN)
x_studio_sfcc_sales_description.description: REAL product description in English — used on website and for business queries.

x_studio_arabic_sfcc_sales_description.label: Arabic Sales Description
x_studio_arabic_sfcc_sales_description.description: REAL product description in Arabic — used on Arabic website.

x_studio_sfcc_accessory_product.label: SFCC Accessory Products
x_studio_sfcc_accessory_product.description: 'Goes with' products — other products that can be sold together with this one (e.g. shirt + hat + shorts). Displayed on website.

image_1920.label: Image
image_1920.description: MAIN display image of the product. Use this when showing product images. Only show extra images if specifically asked.

image.label: Extra Images
image.description: Extra product images after the main image. Stored as attachments.

gender1.label: Gender
gender1.description: IMPORTANT for reporting. Values: baby_boy / baby_girl / unisex.

age_group.label: Age Group
age_group.description: Age group of the product. Values: baby / toddler / child.

x_studio_hs_code.label: HS Code
x_studio_hs_code.description: Global product HS (Harmonized System) code for customs/trade.

x_studio_country_of_origin_1.label: Country of Origin
x_studio_country_of_origin_1.description: Country where the product was manufactured/produced.

x_studio_list_price.label: List Price (Template)
x_studio_list_price.description: NOT USED — actual list price lives at SKU level (x_studio_jc_list_price in product.product).

has_lifestyle.label: Has Lifestyle
has_lifestyle.description: Tells if the product has a lifestyle image.

ai_generated_image.label: AI Generated Lifestyle Image
ai_generated_image.description: Whether the product has AI generated images.

studio_shoot_image.label: Studio Shoot Lifestyle Image
studio_shoot_image.description: Whether the product has real studio-shot images.

sfcc_image_url.label: SFCC Image URL
sfcc_image_url.description: Image URL on the website for this product.

sale_ok.label: Can be Sold
sale_ok.description: Always true — all products can be sold.

purchase_ok.label: Can be Purchased
purchase_ok.description: Always true — all products can be purchased.

route_ids.label: Routes
route_ids.description: Inventory routes for this product (e.g. replenishment rules).

website_sequence.label: Website Sequence
website_sequence.description: Order/sequence of product display on website.

accessory_product_ids.label: Accessory Products
accessory_product_ids.description: Odoo native accessory products (suggested in eCommerce cart).

alternative_product_ids.label: Alternative Products
alternative_product_ids.description: Alternative products displayed at bottom of product pages.

out_of_stock_message.label: Out-of-Stock Message
out_of_stock_message.description: Message shown when product is out of stock on website.

template_general_fields_write_date.label: Template Fields Write Date
template_general_fields_write_date.description: Date when anything on the product template was last updated.

extra_media_write_date.label: Extra Media Write Date
extra_media_write_date.description: Date when extra images were last updated.

x_cat_write_date.label: Category Write Date
x_cat_write_date.description: Date when categories were last updated (added or removed).

x_sfcc_primcat_write_date.label: Primary Category Write Date
x_sfcc_primcat_write_date.description: Date when the primary category was last updated.

public_categ_add_ids.label: Added Categories
public_categ_add_ids.description: Latest categories added to this product.

public_categ_remove_ids.label: Removed Categories
public_categ_remove_ids.description: Latest categories removed from this product.

write_date.label: Last Updated on
write_date.description: Last updated date of the product template.

product.product.label: Product Variant / SKU (Level 3)
product.product.description: The actual SKU / size variant. Child of product.template. This is the lowest level of the product hierarchy. Also called: variant, SKU, size level, product.product. Each record represents one specific size of a colorway.
product.product.note: Actual sale price (lst_price), list/original price (x_studio_jc_list_price) and cost price (standard_price) live at THIS level — not at product.template level.

default_code.label: Default Code / SKU Code
default_code.description: MOST IMPORTANT — unique identifier of this SKU across the system. Also called: internal reference of SKU, SKU code. Used for all queries and identification.

product_tmpl_id.label: Product Template
product_tmpl_id.description: Parent product template (colorway) this SKU belongs to.

product_template_attribute_value_ids.label: Attribute Values
product_template_attribute_value_ids.description: Size of this SKU. The attribute is always 'SKU' and the value is the size.

lst_price.label: Sale Price (Current)
lst_price.description: ACTUAL current sale price of this SKU. This is the real selling price. Also called 'current price'.

x_studio_jc_list_price.label: JC List Price (Original)
x_studio_jc_list_price.description: ACTUAL original/list price of this SKU on the website. The original price before any discounts.

standard_price.label: Cost Price
standard_price.description: ACTUAL cost price of this SKU. Updated from purchase order unit price (price_unit in purchase.order.line).

qty_available.label: Quantity On Hand
qty_available.description: Total stock for this SKU including units that are reserved or in active orders.

free_qty.label: Free To Use Quantity (SOH)
free_qty.description: ACTUAL available to sell quantity. Real SOH. How many units are free and available. Also called: SOH, available qty.

incoming_qty.label: Incoming
incoming_qty.description: Quantity incoming (on confirmed purchase orders not yet received).

outgoing_qty.label: Outgoing
outgoing_qty.description: Quantity outgoing (on confirmed orders not yet shipped).

sales_count.label: Sold
sales_count.description: Total sold quantity of this SKU.

actual_sold.label: Sold QTY
actual_sold.description: Actual sold quantity of this SKU.

qty_purchased.label: Purchased QTY
qty_purchased.description: Total purchased quantity for this SKU across all purchase orders.

in_process.label: In Process
in_process.description: Quantity sold online but not yet picked/packed/validated — somewhere in the fulfillment process.

mayoral_soh.label: Mayoral SOH
mayoral_soh.description: Units of this SKU in Mayoral franchise stock location.

active.label: Active
active.description: Whether this SKU is archived (false) or active (true).

x_avtive.label: Active (Selling Status)
x_avtive.description: true = currently selling / false = not yet published for sale.

x_isNew.label: Is New
x_isNew.description: Tells if this is a new product/SKU.

x_sale.label: Sale
x_sale.description: Whether this SKU is on sale or regular price.

new_pickLocation.label: New Pick Locations
new_pickLocation.description: USED EVERYWHERE — shows how many units are available at different warehouse locations. Replaces old x_pickLocation field.

x_sfcc_salpric_write_date.label: Sale Price Write Date
x_sfcc_salpric_write_date.description: When the sale price (lst_price) was last updated or added.

x_sfcc_lstpric_write_date.label: List Price Write Date
x_sfcc_lstpric_write_date.description: When the list/original price (x_studio_jc_list_price) was last updated or added.

write_date.label: Write Date
write_date.description: Last updated date of this SKU record (default system field).

display_name.label: Display Name
display_name.description: Displayed as [default_code] product_name — used for identification in dropdowns and lists.

combination_indices.label: Combination Indices
combination_indices.description: Unique index of attribute value combination

stock.move.line.label: Individual Stock Move Detail Lines (Most granular level — one line per product/lot moved)

qty_done.label: Qty Done
qty_done.description: Raw quantity actually moved (positive number only)

display_qty_done.label: Display Qty Done
display_qty_done.description: CUSTOM — Quantity with sign (+ incoming / − outgoing)

reference.label: Reference
reference.description: CUSTOM — Identifies what created this move: either a manual inventory update or a stock.picking reference (e.g. JCUSQ/PICK/12634)

picking_code.label: Picking Code
picking_code.description: Type of operation: incoming, outgoing, internal

order_number.label: Order Number
order_number.description: CUSTOM — The actual business order number linked to this move (the SO or PO number that triggered the stock.picking)

move_reason.label: Move Reason
move_reason.description: CUSTOM — The reason/cause for this stock move

total_sold.label: Total Sold
total_sold.description: CUSTOM — Total sold quantity for this product

custom_status.label: Custom Status
custom_status.description: CUSTOM — Custom status label for this move line

sale_price.label: Sale Price
sale_price.description: CUSTOM — Sale price at time of move

on_hand_qty.label: On Hand Qty
on_hand_qty.description: CUSTOM — On-hand quantity snapshot at time of move

free_qty.label: Free Qty
free_qty.description: CUSTOM — Available (unreserved) quantity at time of move

purchase_product_qty.label: Purchase Product Qty
purchase_product_qty.description: CUSTOM — Total purchased quantity for this product

reason.label: Reason
reason.description: CUSTOM — Additional reason field at move line level

is_inventory.label: Is Inventory
is_inventory.description: True if this move was created by an inventory adjustment

picked.label: Picked
picked.description: True if picker physically confirmed this item was picked

is_locked.label: Is Locked
is_locked.description: Whether this line is locked from editing

state.label: State
state.description: Status: draft, confirmed, assigned, done, cancel

origin_returned_move_id.label: Origin Returned Move Id
origin_returned_move_id.description: The move this is a return of

to_refund.label: To Refund
to_refund.description: Whether to update quantities on SO/PO on return

is_inventory.label: Is Inventory
is_inventory.description: True if created by inventory adjustment

price.label: Price
price.description: CUSTOM — Price associated with this move

weight.label: Weight
weight.description: Weight of products in this move

in_date.label: In Date
in_date.description: Date stock arrived at this location

on_hand.label: On Hand
on_hand.description: True if this quant represents physical stock

last_count_date.label: Last Count Date
last_count_date.description: Date of last physical inventory count

inventory_diff_quantity.label: Inventory Diff Quantity
inventory_diff_quantity.description: Difference between counted and system quantity

cyclic_inventory_frequency.label: Cyclic Inventory Frequency
cyclic_inventory_frequency.description: How often (in days) this location is counted

x_pickLocation.label: X Picklocation
x_pickLocation.description: CUSTOM — Pick location reference for warehouse operations

brand_name.label: Brand Name
brand_name.description: CUSTOM — Brand associated with this stock

pos_order_no.label: Pos Order No
pos_order_no.description: CUSTOM — POS order number that affected this quant

sale.order.label: Sale Order
sale.order.description: --- Order Source Identification --- (POS orders identified via pos.order model) --- SFCC Fields (Salesforce Commerce Cloud) --- --- Farfetch Fields --- --- Financial / Wallet / Gift Card --- --- Gift / Packaging --- --- Order Flags / Status --- --- Address Fields --- --- Booker / Assignment --- --- Carrier / Delivery --- --- Website / eCommerce ---

x_sfcc_order.label: X Sfcc Order
x_sfcc_order.description: Value = 1 if order originated from SFCC (Salesforce Commerce Cloud)

farfetch_check.label: Farfetch Check
farfetch_check.description: True if this order came from Farfetch

x_sfcc_ord_taxtot.label: X Sfcc Ord Taxtot
x_sfcc_ord_taxtot.description: Total tax charged on the order in SFCC

x_sfcc_country.label: X Sfcc Country
x_sfcc_country.description: Shipping country ID from SFCC synced into Odoo

x_sfcc_city.label: X Sfcc City
x_sfcc_city.description: Shipping city from SFCC synced into Odoo

x_sfcc_paymethod.label: X Sfcc Paymethod
x_sfcc_paymethod.description: Payment method used on SFCC (e.g. cod, AdyenComponent, DWallet)

x_order_write_date.label: X Order Write Date
x_order_write_date.description: Datetime when the order was written/synced into Odoo from SFCC

locale.label: Locale
locale.description: Locale of order origin. 18 locales total. Format: en_AE = UAE English, ar_SA = Saudi Arabic. Identifies which regional website the order came from

amount_wallet.label: Amount Wallet
amount_wallet.description: Amount the customer paid using their digital wallet

net_after_wallet.label: Net After Wallet
net_after_wallet.description: Total order value minus wallet amount paid

gift_amount.label: Gift Amount
gift_amount.description: Total amount paid through gift cards

net_after_gift_card.label: Net After Gift Card
net_after_gift_card.description: Total order amount after deducting gift card amount

e_wallet_amount.label: E Wallet Amount
e_wallet_amount.description: E-wallet amount applied to the order

return_amount.label: Return Amount
return_amount.description: Total return amount if a return exists on this order

shipping_fee.label: Shipping Fee
shipping_fee.description: Total shipping fee charged on this order

gift_card.label: Gift Card
gift_card.description: True if this order contains a gift card product

gift_wrap.label: Gift Wrap
gift_wrap.description: True if this order includes gift wrapping

gift_card_message.label: Gift Card Message
gift_card_message.description: Message to write on the gift card

gift_wrap_message.label: Gift Wrap Message
gift_wrap_message.description: Message to write on the gift wrap

gift_box.label: Gift Box
gift_box.description: True if customer requested order packed in a gift box

has_missing_products.label: Has Missing Products
has_missing_products.description: True if one or more products are out of stock / insufficient inventory

missing_address.label: Missing Address
missing_address.description: True if something is missing in the shipping address

change_address.label: Change Address
change_address.description: Address change status flag — always set to True to trigger address change workflow

iwt_status.label: Iwt Status
iwt_status.description: True if this order requires an Inter-Warehouse Transfer (IWT) — items need to be moved from another warehouse to the main fulfillment warehouse

shortAddress.label: Shortaddress
shortAddress.description: Saudi orders only — mandatory short shipping address field required by Saudi logistics

booker_id.label: Booker Id
booker_id.description: User who booked this order with courier companies

assigned_booker_id.label: Assigned Booker Id
assigned_booker_id.description: User assigned as booker for this order

ups_bill_my_account.label: Ups Bill My Account
ups_bill_my_account.description: True if shipping cost billed to customer's UPS account

create_package.label: Create Package
create_package.description: Whether to create a package for this order

is_reward_line.label: Is Reward Line
is_reward_line.description: True if this line is a loyalty/promo reward

code.label: Code
code.description: CUSTOM — Contains the gift card code

message.label: Message
message.description: CUSTOM — Contains the gift card message

name_short.label: Name Short
name_short.description: CUSTOM — Short product name for display

is_before_confirmed_line.label: Is Before Confirmed Line
is_before_confirmed_line.description: CUSTOM — True if this line was added before the order was confirmed

interwarehouse_channel_id.label: Interwarehouse Channel Id
interwarehouse_channel_id.description: CUSTOM — Inter-warehouse channel used for IWT fulfillment of this line

parent_line_id.label: Parent Line Id
parent_line_id.description: CUSTOM — Parent SOL for bundled/linked products

linked_line_id.label: Linked Line Id
linked_line_id.description: CUSTOM — Linked order line (e.g. gift wrap linked to a specific product line)

conflicts_sample.kept: Technical field documentation for AI assistant / Text-to-SQL RAG system. Covers all major Odoo models used in the business flow: Purchase → Inventory → Sales → Accounts.
conflicts_sample.ignored: Knowledge base for AI-assisted querying over Odoo (Products, Variants, Purchase, Inventory/Stock, Sales). Converted from internal text format.

conflicts_sample.kept: MOST IMPORTANT — unique product code used throughout the system. Main unique identity of the product at colorway level. All queries and data requests are based on this.
Always set to 'All' — not used for business categorization.
Unit of measure for the product.
NOT USED — actual sale price lives at SKU level (lst_price in product.product).
NOT USED — actual cost price lives at SKU level (standard_price in product.product).
Whether the product is archived (false) or active (true).
Always true — all products can be sold.
Always true — all products can be purchased.
Relation between this colorway (parent) and its child SKUs (product.product).
Number of child SKUs (sizes) under this colorway.
Attribute is always 'SKU' with size values — used to create variants (product.product children/SKUs).
MAIN display image of the product. Use this when showing product images. Only show extra images if specifically asked.
Inventory routes for this product (e.g. replenishment rules).
Parent product template (colorway) this SKU belongs to.
Size of this SKU. The attribute is always 'SKU' and the value is the size.
conflicts_sample.ignored: Specific attribute values for this variant (e.g. Size: 4Y, Color: Red)

conflicts_sample.kept: MOST IMPORTANT — unique identifier of this SKU across the system. Also called: internal reference of SKU, SKU code. Used for all queries and identification.
Whether this SKU is archived (false) or active (true).
ACTUAL cost price of this SKU. Updated from purchase order unit price (price_unit in purchase.order.line).
Total stock for this SKU including units that are reserved or in active orders.
ACTUAL available to sell quantity. Real SOH. How many units are free and available. Also called: SOH, available qty.
PO order number — unique identifier of the PO used for search.
The vendor this PO is placed with.
Status of the PO. 'purchase' = confirmed, 'done' = locked (all done). Business usually progresses to 'purchase' state and stops after receipt validation. Not creating bills/payments currently.
conflicts_sample.ignored: Status: draft, sent, purchase, done, cancel

conflicts_sample.kept: Date when the PO was confirmed.
Expected arrival date of the goods.
Currency in which products are being purchased. Stored in currency table.
Subtotal of the PO before tax.
Tax amount — usually 5% VAT in Dubai.
Lines of the PO, each linked to a product.product (SKU).
Receipts created based on partial receiving of products.
Internal user responsible for this PO.
Internal notes or T&C for this PO.
The parent Purchase Order this line belongs to.
The SKU ordered. ID is displayed as [default_code] name — the internal reference code plus product name.
Demand — how many units are ordered on this line.
Quantity actually received for this line.
Billed quantity — same as received unless items are damaged.
Cost price of this SKU — becomes standard_price in product.product after PO confirmation.
Expected arrival date for this line.
Stock moves generated from this PO line.
Receipt/Transfer ID — unique identifier used to search for a specific picking (e.g. JCUSQ/IN/00102).
Vendor or customer associated with this picking.
Defines the type of picking: Receipt, Delivery, Internal Transfer, etc. This is what differentiates all picking records.

conflicts_sample.ignored: Status: draft, confirmed, assigned, done, cancel

conflicts_sample.kept: Where stock is going after the operation.
The PO/SO/other document for which this picking was created. Links back to the source.
When the receipt/transfer was validated and completed.
Link to stock.move — all stock in/out movements are tracked there. This is the relationship to the stock.move model.
Relationship at the order line item level (stock.move.line) — detailed scan/operation level.
When there is a partial delivery, backorders are created. This links the backorder to the original picking.
conflicts_sample.ignored: Links to original transfer if this is a backorder

conflicts_sample.kept: If this is a return, links to the original picking.
conflicts_sample.ignored: Links to original transfer if this is a return

conflicts_sample.kept: Flag telling the warehouse team that someone else is already scanning/processing this picking.
Flags this picking as a return operation.
